pages.text: $(li)The Sack can be useful to carry more items with you, like a $(l:patchouli:perks/backpack)Backpack$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/shulker_box)Shulker Box$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can carry a maximum two, because if you carry three or more you will receive the $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/slowness)Slownesss$(/l) effect.
$(li)As you increase the number of Sacks, you will receive a stronger Slowness effect, making it harder and harder for you to move.
$(li)You can save items to a Sack from the inventory, dragging them into it and right clicking on it.
